website_summaries.verdict: A unique looking shoe with an exceptionally breathable upper. Great for warm days.
pros: The Apollo 2 features a solid construction and a well-ventilated design
Fit is comfortable and double-layer cushioning makes runs in this shoe even more enjoyable
Shoe flexes naturally and is fairly lightweight
cons: Not as durable as other Under Armour designs

customer_reviews.title: Spectacular Shoes
customer_reviews.text: these are my first pair of non Nike shoe that i like more than all my previous Nike shoes. i have tried adidas, asics and reebok before but always went back to nike. this time though there is no regret and no looking back. this shoe beat Nike in comfort and surprisingly on design. i tend to think Nike shoes are the best looking shoes around if not the most comfortable and long lasting. these shoes look absolutely spectacular, are insanely comfortable from the first wear. there is no breaking in period. i am not a very serious or long distance runner but for my short runs and walks with my dog and daily casual use these shoes are great.
customer_reviews.author: mrnd23

customer_reviews.title: Light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Bought these in store a year or so ago. Love them so much I decided to order another pair on Amazon for a replacement down the road. Best shoes I have ever owned. I had tried other Under Armour shoes but they didn't fit as comfortably. The meshlike material on the side is nice to have considering I have wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I will purchase again. For me, I read the reviews as far as sizing, it seemed that they ran a bit small, so I ordered a half size bigger. Well, for me, they're sized accurate. Mine a bit big, but nothing like a deal breaker. Totally love the look, feel, weight, and comfort of this shoe. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Al M

customer_reviews.title: not made for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I am leaving an average reason for several reasons. great shoe, but found it to be narrow in/around the arch area, as well a bit irritating where the tongue went under the laces. Found the toe area not to be as snug as expected as well. Perhaps I'm just in between sizes, or its just not the right shoe design for me.
customer_reviews.author: beachbum

customer_reviews.title: I loved my original Apollo running shoes so I thought these ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved my original Apollo running shoes so I thought these would be a nice replacement. However, I find they are not close to as comfortable as my former pair. They fit a lot snugger - should have probably bought a 1/2 size up but since they were they were an updated model I assumed they would be ok and simply needed to be broken in. They also cut a little in the heel which is not something I experienced with the older versions. Unfortunately for me these were a step back and not an advancement. Not sure I'll stick to Under Armour for running shoes anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Richard O' Connor

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and UA as a company. They always make solid comfortable fashionable clothing I wear all day to the gym and to work! These are my new favorite shoes, they have the best comfort, style and color!
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tagliaferri Jr

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my boyfriend who normally wears 12.5, they were a little too snug so we had to return them and go with a 13 which is a perfect fit. He couldn't be happier with these shoes!
customer_reviews.author: MBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I'm severely disappointed in UA
customer_reviews.text: I'm severely disappointed in UA. This shoe failed after 2 days of light use. (Part of the sole started tearing off) Apollo quality seems to go down as time passes. Very disappointing for a brand that used to be really good. I will go with Nike Frees for now.
customer_reviews.author: SpritePR

customer_reviews.title: Another hit for UA
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoes for running or walking. I always wear a size 10.5 in Nike shoes and have to go half a size larger in UA, all models. Ordered size 11 in the Apollo 2 and they are comfortable without or with socks.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: They give good support to my feet
customer_reviews.text: These Under Armour shoes were worth the money. They fit a little small, so I do suggest going up a half size. I use them when I lift weights and run. They give good support to my feet, and are lightweight. I bought the black and red shoes. I love the colors. I would buy another pair once these shoes get worn out.
customer_reviews.author: JC Ward

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes.  Comfortable from the first moment.
customer_reviews.text: Best fitting and most comfortable athletic shoes I have owned. Comfortable from day one all day. Order 1/2 size larger than normal for comfortable fit. Will reorder again next time too.
customer_reviews.author: Lott

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes. They fit like a glove. Almost like an aqua sock. Very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: james r baker

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, go about a half size bigger than ...
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, go about a half size bigger than what you usually wear and you'll get a much better fit.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes to train for and run a half marathon. Comfortable and light weight. Shoe feels like it is a sleeve that wraps and cushions your foot.
customer_reviews.author: John D Walls JR

customer_reviews.title: Six Star
customer_reviews.text: I went with I half size larger in a gym show and I couldn't be happier. They have some stretch to them that secures and supports my foot like none other I have owned.
customer_reviews.author: gnewsum

customer_reviews.title: They are very nice. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are my first UA shoes. They are very nice. Very comfortable. I run several times a week so I will have the chance to test their durability. I had 2 runs so far and they were very good.
customer_reviews.author: Jovan Pantelic

customer_reviews.title: A great light comfortable choice!
customer_reviews.text: Great color and very comfortable. A great under armour choice. Great for running and everyday wear. Fit perfectly and are light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shan. M

customer_reviews.title: Lit Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Somehow after 4 months of wearing them daily they don't have stains or rips in them. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: They didnt have a very good grip on wet asphalt the first time I ran ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been running in them 4 times now. They fit well, decent impact absorption. They didnt have a very good grip on wet asphalt the first time I ran with them. Perhaps this will improve after breaking them in.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 pairs of them and I absolutely love them. They are extremely comfortable and I wear them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Bcjohnson44

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. Would recommend ordering a 1/2 size larger than you would normally wear.
customer_reviews.author: Terry J McMaster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! Awesome feel! Super lightweight perfect for everyday use love the color!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoe I use it for the treadmill only. ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfy shoe I use it for the treadmill only. I would buy 1/2 size bigger than normal. It does run small.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking/feeling shoe. Terrible quality.
customer_reviews.text: Although the shoes were very comfortable, fit as expected, and looked totally bad ass, I was extremely upset with the quality of the manufacturing and returned the shoes. After one day/run wearing them, part of the rubber sole tore off on one of the sneakers and part of the rubber sole was coming apart on the other shoe as well. If Under Armour wants to keep me buying their products I recommend they sacrifice weight for quality. I would rather have a shoe that is several ounces heavier and lasts longer than a week, then a light shoe that tears after a day. I hope this comments helps.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Patsiarikas

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair of work out/running or walking sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Super light, comfortable and feels like your walking on air
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Scratches the back of the heel a bit. Wear higher socks with these
customer_reviews.author: Gary Wei

customer_reviews.title: They're comfortable and fit great
customer_reviews.text: I've never gotten so many compliments on running shoes. They're comfortable and fit great. Product exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew M.

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are very comfortable and look great
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are very comfortable and look great... I have a wide foot and fit great... had other ua shoes and by far these feel the best!! Very happy
customer_reviews.author: Tito

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and great looking shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Great looking pair of shoes and very comfortable even without socks. Fit as expected lengthwise, but found it a little narrow around the middle of the feet. Using it for runs below 10km and for gym. Not sure if would work as well for longer runs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Adding mileage to my runs
customer_reviews.text: I've worn them daily since I got them. In 10 days I've put it 60 plus miles In them and they feel good
customer_reviews.author: Brian Harrell

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my husband. They fit great and look awesome
customer_reviews.author: Higgs

customer_reviews.title: Great product...MAY run small
customer_reviews.text: Great product...just a bit small. I gave them to my son and will order a larger size because they are such a great shoe! light, very comfortable and affordable!
customer_reviews.author: chad

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size run small than the actual size mentioned, and not enough support on The feet
customer_reviews.author: Manlio Salgado

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes from a great company. There's not much to say other than I love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Nice running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Nice running shoes but difficult to convert men's to women's will order larger size returning one purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Average...
customer_reviews.text: For the price Is say I got a decent deal.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to break them to loosen them up but that didn't take long.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Perez

customer_reviews.title: Great Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Like most US sneakers I went up a 1/2 size and fit is great. Great looks and comfort with these sneakers.
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect for what I need. I only run a short distance at a time andbthese shoes have done wonders for my feet. Nice and light too.
customer_reviews.author: Ross A Scheuer Sr.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Best running shoes ever. I wear them almost every day. I have a flat foot and they have the perfect cushioning for my feet. loved them. Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical that they would be good running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Skeptical that they would be good running shoes, but they are very comfortable, supportive, and a better value than frees
customer_reviews.author: Justin Halama

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars 5 reasons
customer_reviews.text: 1. Beautiful. 2. Comfortable. 3. Fit as expected. 4. Good value. 5. Unconcentiinal design.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tough to get comfortable shoes for me
customer_reviews.text: Slippers!! Tough to get comfortable shoes for me; these are them. Really like how light they are as well.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Berg, Co-author of THE NIGHT POLICE, Beyond the Line of Duty

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The toe is a little tight. But overall a well needed improvement over the old Apollo model.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Love These Sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sneakers because I thought they looked cool. Turns out they are very comfortable, too. Very happy with my purchase and would recommend UA sneakers to anyone now.
customer_reviews.author: TQ

customer_reviews.title: UA Speed Form Apollo 2
customer_reviews.text: Product as described, fast shipping from US to INA. It only took 8 days. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Namf

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: excellent fit and so light, both as running shoes or sneaker
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: first time buying shoes in US and I am unfamiliar with the size
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not the color shown
customer_reviews.text: Great feel! Instant comfort and relief. The reason I take away two stars: it seems impossible to find a vibrant/fluorescent green shoe, that isn't a piece of crap. THIS looked spot on. Even says "Fuel Green". Well, it's not green, at all. I guess "Fuel Green" is another way to say yellow. The picture is definitely NOT the real color. It's a highlighter yellow. No green involved at all. If they weren't a comfortable show, I'd be returning these. If you're looking for a true fluorescent green, DON'T buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Fit great... Went for a run to break them in, and no discomfort at all..love them!!!!! Only giving 3 stars because of lack of color option for this exact shoe. Woulda been 4-5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Nickbrico

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's UA Speedform Apollo 2 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Innovative UA SpeedForm technology delivers zero distraction while runningFoam infused into heel to provide better lock down and plush comfortSmooth, ultrasonic welded seaming with Bemis tape for next-to-skin support and comfortPerforated upper with ultrasonic seal for durable breathabilityArch reinforcement construction for precise fit and foot guidanceEmbedded sockliner within cavity of midsole for added cushioning, moisture wicking and seamless comfortDual-layer midsole combines Charged Cushioning on top of Micro G foam for the ultimate blend of cushioned support and explosive responsivenessAnatomical rubber outsole for natural flex and durability with a 8mm offset
